channel.title: Client help?!
channel.description: Hey Sorry if this is the wrong section , i just need some quick help, im kinda new to server making, i have my client compiled, my server is all good, everything is good, but theres one little thing i need help with, i want to no how to send my client to everyone to play?? This may sound stupid to you but i havnt found help anywhere on how to do this, So i all need to do is how do i send the client to my friends etc so they can play? If you can help then TY so much!!

item.title: Client help?!
item.dc:creator: @tyecrane tyecrane
item.description:
@tyecrane wrote:

Do i just upload the run.bat, because i tried doing that and sending it to friends but it didnt work??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2009, 07:46:45 pm[/size][hr]n im using hamachi.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help?!
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Please make sure that before you upload it though that they are connecting through your no-ip or w/e host you used network before you send it to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help?!

item.description:

upload it on www.uppit.com

then give your friends the link for the download.
